Title: xine-lib: Buffer overflow vulnerability
Synopsis:
xine-lib contains a buffer overflow vulnerability which may lead to the
    execution of arbitrary code.

Background.Text: xine-lib is the xine core engine. xine is a free multimedia player. It plays CDs, DVDs, and VCDs, and can also decode other common multimedia formats.

Description.Text: Federico L. Bossi Bonin discovered that when handling MPEG streams xine-lib fails to make a proper boundary check of the input data supplied by the user before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer.

Impact.Text: A remote attacker could entice a user to play a specially-crafted MPEG file, resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the permissions of the user running the application.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All xine-lib users should upgrade to the latest version:
